00032 #ifndef SPEX_H_

00043 void load(const char *fname, spIdx<double> &xp, Idx<ubyte> &yp, intg loadsize);
00044 
00045 class spnet {
00046 
00047         /*******************************************
00048          * neural net structure used for the project :
00049          * a -log(softmax) on top of a linear module
00050          * to perform a logarithmic regression
00051          *
00052          * The loss function is
00053          * Loss(X,y,W) = -Wy.X + log SUM_z exp(Wz.X) + |W|1
00054          *
00055          *      Where Wi is the i-th line of W and the SUM is made
00056          *      on every classes, and |W|1 is the sum on each
00057          *      absolute value of the elements in W
00058          */
00059 protected :
00060         state_spidx *inter;
00061 
00062 public :
00063         sp_linear_module mylinmodule;
00064         sp_logsoftmax_module mysoftmodule;
00065 
00066         spnet(parameter *p, Idx<intg>* connection_table, intg in, intg out, double beta, Idx<ubyte> *classes);
00067         ~spnet();
00068 
00071         void fprop(state_spidx *in, state_spidx *out, Idx<ubyte> *label, class_state *output, state_idx *energy);
00073         void bprop(state_spidx *in, state_spidx *out);
00074         void forget(forget_param_linear forgetparam);
00075 
00076 };
00077 
00078 class sptrainer{
00079 
00080         /***********************************************
00081          * Trainer used to train the previous net
00082          */
00083 public:
00084         int nclasses;
00085         intg age;
00086         Idx<ubyte> *labels, *label, doclabels, doclabels2;
00087         spIdx<double> docs, docs2;
00088         Idx<intg> *myconnections;
00089 
00090         spLabeledDataSource<double, ubyte> *mydatasource, *mytestsource;
00091         parameter *myparam;
00092         gd_param *gdp;
00093         spnet *mynet;
00094         classifier_meter *trainmeter, *testmeter;
00095 
00096         state_spidx *in, *out;
00097         class_state *output;
00098         state_idx *energy;
00099 
00100 public:
00103         sptrainer(const string trainname, const string testname);
00104         ~sptrainer();
00105 
00108         void train(int npass);
00110         void train_online();
00111         void test();
00112 };
00113 #endif /* SPEX_H_ */
